transform_def.name: average_ghosts
transform_def.string: let n = complex(sin(toReal(truncateToInt(p_in.x))), cos(toReal(truncateToInt(p_in.y)))) r = length(vec2(n.im + n.re)) * twoinvpi() x = truncateToInt(r) y1 = log(complex(tan(toReal(x)), sin(toReal(x)))) y2 = log(complex(cos(toReal(x)), tan(toReal(x)))) in (p_in * vec2(y1.im + y2.re).x * floor(r)) * (0.1 / weight)
